sentences: Sa tõstab mind kodusse järele ja toimid mind üles. Minusse.
Kas sa võid minu vahelduseks minusse jääda?
Ma tahan, et sa oled alati minusse.
context: 'Minusse' is an Estonian prepositional phrase meaning 'to/for/towards me'. It is used in both literal and figurative contexts to indicate direction or possession related to the speaker. In everyday speech, it can be part of expressions showing personal interest or attention.
